post.text: Thank you Charlotte, North Carolina! We are going to have an AMAZING victory on November 8th...because this is all about the people! #MAGA

comment.author: Monique
comment.text: I urge all Trump supporters to boycott the media. Call them out, email them, write letters to them to call out their bias against Trump, and that they need to be professional and report, not give opinion, the news. Where's their coverage on the Wikileaks? #BoycottCNN #BoycottMSNBC #BoycottABCNews #BoycottCBSNews #BoycottNBCNews #CallThemOut

replies.author: Marisa
replies.text: Fox News is the only one to listen to.

replies.author: Joel
replies.text: The media are promoting lies. Don't fall for it people. Don't give up! John Barry, cousin of accuser Summer Zervos makes official statement of how she has lied about Mr. Trump. A witness has also come out against Ms Leeds accusing her of lying as well. I believe when the lies are revealed Trump will win. https://www.donaldjtrump.com/press-releases/statement-from-john-barry Trump 2016! Share everywhere.

replies.author: Alison
replies.text: Fox should just change its name to weasel news. They're just as bad these days. Listen to rush on EIB, read American thinker, Canada free press, breitbart. And you have to boycott the sponsers. Starve the troll media, and they die.
